meanings.sent1: The material was nonpolarizable, so it did not respond to the electric field.
meanings.sent2: The nonpolarizable substance remained unaffected by the magnetic force.
meanings.sent3: The stubborn rock was like a nonpolarizable object, refusing to budge no matter what.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was nonpolarizable, firmly set in its ways and resistant to change.
meanings.sent5: The nonpolarizable barrier stood strong against any attempts to alter its structure.

meanings.sent1: The nonpolarizable material could not change its alignment in the magnetic field.
meanings.sent2: The nonpolarizable substance did not shift when exposed to the electric charge.
meanings.sent3: The cat acted like a nonpolarizable creature, staying still even when tempted with treats.
meanings.sent4: His emotions seemed nonpolarizable, staying constant regardless of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The nonpolarizable object resisted any attempts to alter its state of polarization.

meanings.sent1: The nonpolarizable material remained neutral in the presence of the magnetic field.
meanings.sent2: The nonpolarizable substance did not show any change in response to the electric field.
meanings.sent3: The tree was like a nonpolarizable entity, standing tall and unmoved by the wind.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were nonpolarizable, unaffected by external influences.
meanings.sent5: The nonpolarizable surface reflected light evenly, showing no signs of polarization.
